9) Troubleshooting
• Single-line JSON → Ensure exporter uses json.dump(..., indent=2).
• Large shards → Reduce MAX_ITEMS_PER_SHARD or add more tags to split data.
• Zero exports → Set public flag or adjust tag inference.
• Push failures → Next cron run retries; check Git credentials/remote.

10) Security Posture (Reasonable, Public-Ready)
• Mirror contains only redacted/approved content; full/private stays in MariaDB and
/memory API.
• No headers or keys needed for public mirror; easy for AI tools to read.
• Toggle the 'public' flag to publish/unpublish items; re-export to update.
11) How ChatGPT/Claude Should Navigate
1) Fetch the STABLE search map URL.
2) Load relevant shards listed under 'tokens'.
3) Follow 'chunk_urls' to retrieve specific content.
4) Use /meta files to check freshness before deep reads.
Iterative Changelog
• exporter.py — v1.2 included (pretty JSON, shard splitting, stable + nonce search map).
Status: ready.
• URLs — Stable RAW links added explicitly. Status: ready.
• Guide — End-to-end instructions, schemas, setup, cron, verification, troubleshooting.
Status: delivered.
